## getCliName() function

convert package name to cli name

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getCliName(packageName: string): string;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter   | Type                | Description |
| ----------- | ------------------- | ----------- |
| packageName | <code>string</code> |             |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string`

normalized and kebab-cased packageName

## Example

```ts
getCliName('my.lib'); // => my-lib
getCliName('@my-scope/my-lib'); // => my-scope-my-lib
```
